des: "An easy to make great tasting combination of blue cheese and green olives.  Once you start eating this you won't stop!  I like to spread it on thin wheat crackers."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese, butter and blue cheese. Stir in the olives and chives. Spoon onto plastic wrap and gather into a ball. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes. To serve, unwrap and place on a serving tray. Surround with your favorite crackers.
